A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: An amazing Star Wars installment. People complaining about Luke's arc weren't paying attention to the end. Only 4.5 stars because there is a fairly pointless 30-45 minutes subplot that drags the film down. However\, the main arcs\, action\, performances\, set pieces\, etc are all first class. I'm excited to see where they take Episode IX.
